s1.message: The following lists the changes compared to Adblock Plus 2.0. If you experience issues with this release please check the list of known issues.

s2.message: Fixed: Adding a different subscription might add a main subscription that isn't required (forum topic).

s3.message: Not enforcing that old Firefox 3.6/Thunderbird 3.1 releases aren't used (due to an addons.mozilla.org limitation).
